titleStmt.title: At Edinburgh, the twenty fifth day of January, 1677. : Forasmuch, as a considerable number of brewers for themselves, and in behalf of the remanent brewers within the town of Edinburgh, and the shires of Edinburgh and Haddingtoun, have proposed and desired, that they may be allowed to sell the ale and drinking beer ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

titleStmt.title: At Edinburgh, the twenty fifth day of January, 1677. : Forasmuch, as a considerable number of brewers for themselves, and in behalf of the remanent brewers within the town of Edinburgh, and the shires of Edinburgh and Haddingtoun, have proposed and desired, that they may be allowed to sell the ale and drinking beer ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Al. Gibsone, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
